name: TGS solution
description: The TGS solution is a  website for a software development company which deals with website development,custom software development ,ecommerce platform development etc. The website is built using next js framework.

name: Regular taste
description: Today we are living in such a world where everyone wants to get what he/she wishes by one click, how about if we get hygenic foods at our door steps only by ordering from online with one click.Regular taste is a caffeshop website which brings customer closer to it.

name: Wecorporate
description: The Wecorporate is a agency website which deals with digital marketing ,SEO ,Content marketing etc.  The website is built using next js framework and styled component.

name: Spicein
description: Spice in is a beautiful restaurant website for your business build with innovative ideas.Fine dining , casual eateries can be easily done by just viewing the menu section.

name: The cookbook
description: Cooking becomes a very elegant profession now a days.But its very difficult for beginners as they dont know how do they start.The cookbook helps them out by blogging delicious recipies.
